items.title: Migrant arrivals in Spain's Balearics surge as smugglers switch routes
items.summary: BARCELONA (Reuters) -Nineteen boats carrying around 360 people reached Spain's Balearic Islands in the past two days, the latest surge in arrivals defying attempts by authorities to curb the fastest-growing migratory route into the European Union. Read full story

items.summary: BERLIN, Nov. 13 (Xinhua) -- Forty-four percent of the more than 3,500 German companies surveyed in around 90 countries and regions reported negative or strongly negative impacts from U.S. trade policies, according to the German Chamber of Commerce and Industry (DIHK) on Thursday. items.summary: The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission has received 22 reports of overheating, smoking, or burning Tesla Powerwall 2 home batteries. The company will replace defective units.

items.title: Young Ukrainian men needed at home, Germany's Merz tells Zelenskiy
items.summary: BERLIN (Reuters) -German Chancellor Friedrich Merz told Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy that he needed to ensure that young men from Ukraine do not come to Germany in large numbers, in what he said was a "lengthy" phone conversation the two held on Thursday. Read full story

items.title: Zelenskiy visits troops near Zaporizhzhia front as Russian pressure mounts
items.summary: LONDON/KYIV (Reuters) -President Volodymyr Zelenskiy visited troops near Ukraine's southeastern front on Thursday, warning of the need to shore up the lines after losing ground in increasingly high-intensity battles far from Russia's offensive in the east. Read full story

items.title: Britain's economic growth slows to 0.1 pct in Q3

items.summary:

This is an $800 set, which is now seeing a 39% discount. Today’s deal shaves $310 off this 4-pack, marking the return of the 2025 low it recently hit ahead of the fall Prime Day sale.
